actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to treat certain fishermen as employees for purposes of the income tax and social security taxes.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code and Title II (Old-Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to apply a tax on the wages of fishermen who are paid a share of the catch on boats with crews of ten or less members for purposes of: (1) the Federal Insurance Contributions Act; (2) the income tax; and (3) OASDI.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to treat certain fishermen as employees for purposes of the income tax and social security taxes.
